title: Request a new model run
text:
Provide the relevant properties to start a new model run.


Model run identifier 


Select modelling area  Egypt Ethiopia Kenya Sudan 


Select HRU  UX345 IY783 SD453 RE432 


Select Model  SWAT-Modflow DSSAT 


Period










Time step  2hr 8hr 24hr 48hr 96hr 


 Land management  Low Medium High 


Scenario  Fertility Erosion Drought Pests/Deseases 


Interventions (BMP)

 Drip irrigation


 Gully irrigation


 Ridges

title: Model introduction
text:
This websites hosts an interface to interact with a model which predicts agricultural scenario’s in 4 regions in the east of Africa.

Request a model run
Analyse existing runs
